suite.name: RoadTestSuite
suite.description: This test suite checks each road name to see that they are of appropriate length and checks to see if they are on the list of possible road names. It also checks to see if any roads are contained in a specified box.

test.name: NameLookup
test.description: Checks to see if the road name is in the list of possible names.

test.name: RoadsInbox
test.description: Checks to see if there are any roads in a given box
